{ "tiddlers": { "$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion": { "text": "{ "transclude-created": "show", "1a test tiddler": "show-individual" }", "type": "application/json", "title": "$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion", "modifier": "HC Haase", "modified": "20200520100457327", "creator": "HC Haase", "created": "20200507103645732" }, "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/core/macros/toc-tranclusion": { "text": "\define toc-caption-transclusion() <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <$transclude field="caption"> <$view field="title"/> <> \end \define toc-body-transclusion(tag,sort:"",itemClassFilter,exclude,path)
    <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<__tag__>!has[draft.of]$sort$] -[<__tag__>] -[enlist<__exclude__>]"""> <$vars item=<> path={{{ [<__path__>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<__tag__>] }}}> <$set name="excluded" filter="""[enlist<__exclude__>] [<__tag__>]"""> <$set name="toc-item-class" filter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> emptyValue="toc-item-selected" value="toc-item">
  1. >> <$list filter="[all[current]toc-link[no]]" emptyMessage="<$link><$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/>"> <> <$macrocall $name="toc-body-transclusion" tag=<> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> exclude=<> path=<>/>
\end \define toc-transclusion(tag,sort:"",itemClassFilter:"") <$macrocall $name="toc-body-transclusion" tag=<<__tag__>> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> /> \end \define toc-linked-expandable-body-transclusion(tag,sort:"",itemClassFilter,exclude,path) <$qualify name="toc-state" title={{{ [[$:/state/toc]addsuffix<__path__>addsuffix[-]addsuffix] }}}> <$set name="toc-item-class" filter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> emptyValue="toc-item-selected" value="toc-item">

    • \end \define toc-expandable-empty-message-transclusion() <$macrocall $name="toc-linked-expandable-body-transclusion" tag=<> sort=<> itemClassFilter=<> exclude=<> path=<>/> \end \define toc-expandable-transclusion(tag,sort:"",itemClassFilter:"",exclude,path) <$vars tag=<<__tag__>> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> path={{{ [<__path__>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<__tag__>] }}}> <$set name="excluded" filter="""[enlist<__exclude__>] [<__tag__>]""">
      <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<__tag__>!has[draft.of]$sort$] -[<__tag__>] -[enlist<__exclude__>]"""> <$list filter="[all[current]toc-link[no]]" emptyMessage=<> > <$macrocall $name="toc-unlinked-expandable-body-transclusion" tag=<<__tag__>> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter="""itemClassFilter""" exclude=<> path=<> />
    \end \define toc-linked-selective-expandable-body-transclusion(tag,sort:"",itemClassFilter,exclude,path) <$qualify name="toc-state" title={{{ [[$:/state/toc]addsuffix<__path__>addsuffix[-]addsuffix] }}}> <$set name="toc-item-class" filter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> emptyValue="toc-item-selected" value="toc-item" >

    • \end \define toc-selective-expandable-empty-message-transclusion() <$macrocall $name="toc-linked-selective-expandable-body-transclusion" tag=<> sort=<> itemClassFilter=<> exclude=<> path=<>/> \end \define toc-selective-expandable-transclusion(tag,sort:"",itemClassFilter,exclude,path) <$vars tag=<<__tag__>> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> path={{{ [<__path__>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<__tag__>] }}}> <$set name="excluded" filter="""[enlist<__exclude__>] [<__tag__>]""">
      <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<__tag__>!has[draft.of]$sort$] -[<__tag__>] -[enlist<__exclude__>]"""> <$list filter="[all[current]toc-link[no]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage=<> > <$macrocall $name="toc-unlinked-selective-expandable-body-transclusion" tag=<<__tag__>> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> exclude=<> path=<>/>
    \end \define toc-caption-transclusion-individual() <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <$transclude field="caption"> <$view field="title"/> <$reveal class="hideprint" type="nomatch" stateTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" stateIndex=<> default={{$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate!!default-state-transclude}} text="show" > <$button setTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" setIndex=<> setTo="show" class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Show content" > {{$:/core/images/unfold-button}} <$reveal class="hideprint" type="match" stateTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" stateIndex=<> default={{$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate!!default-state-transclude}} text="show" > <$button setTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" setIndex=<> setTo="hide" class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Hide content" > {{$:/core/images/fold-button}} <$reveal class="hideprint" type="match" stateTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" stateIndex=<> default={{$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate!!default-state-transclude}} text="show" > <> \end \define toc-body-transclusion-individual(tag,sort:"",itemClassFilter,exclude,path)
      <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<__tag__>!has[draft.of]$sort$] -[<__tag__>] -[enlist<__exclude__>]"""> <$vars item=<> path={{{ [<__path__>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<__tag__>] }}}> <$set name="excluded" filter="""[enlist<__exclude__>] [<__tag__>]"""> <$set name="toc-item-class" filter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> emptyValue="toc-item-selected" value="toc-item">

    \end \define toc-transclusion-individual(tag,sort:"",itemClassFilter:"") <$macrocall $name="toc-body-transclusion-individual" tag=<<__tag__>> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> /> \end \define toc-linked-expandable-body-transclusion-individual(tag,sort:"",itemClassFilter,exclude,path) <$qualify name="toc-state" title={{{ [[$:/state/toc]addsuffix<__path__>addsuffix[-]addsuffix] }}}> <$set name="toc-item-class" filter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> emptyValue="toc-item-selected" value="toc-item">

      <$list filter="""[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<__tag__>!has[draft.of]$sort$] -[<__tag__>] -[enlist<__exclude__>]"""> <$list filter="[all[current]toc-link[no]]" variable="ignore" emptyMessage=<> > <$macrocall $name="toc-unlinked-selective-expandable-body-transclusion-individual" tag=<<__tag__>> sort=<<__sort__>> itemClassFilter=<<__itemClassFilter__>> exclude=<> path=<>/>
    \end * ''Version'': 1.0.0 * ''Date'': 2020/05/05 * ''Creator'': HC Haase. !! Function transcluds tiddlers for the toc's in a box with the color of "code" background and date stamp in the right corner (toggle in readme). There is also a version for toggling individual tiddlers with a button !! Use ;Syntax for toc's with transclusion :`<>` <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param="<>"}>Copy :`<>` <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param="<>"}>Copy :`<>` <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param="<>"}>Copy ;Syntax for toc's with individual transclusion :`<>` <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param="<>"}>Copy :`<>` <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param="<>"}>Copy :`<>` <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param="<>"}>Copy apart from the added transclusions, they function as the nromal toc macro's. See [[$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/macro/transclusion]] for the transclusion macro. ", "title": "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/core/macros/toc-tranclusion", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modifier": "HC Haase", "modified": "20200515091211071", "creator": "HC Haase", "created": "20200427072213234" }, "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/license": { "text": "Copyright 2020 Hans Christian Haase https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are met: 1. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.", "title": "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/license", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modifier": "HC Haase", "modified": "20200518083746879", "creator": "HC Haase", "created": "20200218144119915" }, "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/Stylesheet": { "created": "20200218130355102", "creator": "HC Haase", "text": "/*box/indet/print adopted from $:/.giffmex/.Stylesheet4tiddlyblink - changed colours to use tw standard code block colours and normal forground/text colours */ /*BOXES*/ html body.tc-body .transclude-box { display:block; background-color: <>; color: <>; padding:5px; padding-left:20px; padding-top:10px; margin-top:5px; margin-bottom:5px; width:95%; } html body.tc-body .subtext { display:block; text-align:right; opacity: 0.5; } /*INDENTING*/ html body.tc-body .toc-indent {margin-left:1.5em;display:block;} /*HIDE SECTIONS FOR PRINTING*/ @media print {#tc-page-background {display: none ! important;}} @media print {.tc-tags-wrapper {display: none ! important;}} @media print { body.tc-body {background-color: transparent;}} @media print {.tc-image-chevron-up {display: none ! important;}} @media print {.tc-image-chevron-down {display: none ! important;}} @media print {button.sidebar-toggle {display: none ! important;}} @media print {.hideprint, .no-print {display: none ! important;}} /*ADDED.NO-PRINT - CLEAN OUT HIDEPRINT OR NO-PRINT*/ /* @media print {.tc-btn-invisible {display: none ! important;}} */ @media print { .story-river { margin: 0; padding: 0; } html body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-frame { margin: 0; border-bottom: 1px solid #fff; padding: 5px;} html body.tc-body a.tc-tiddlylink-external:hover { border: 1px solid <>; } html body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-info { padding: 14px 42px 14px 42px; background-color: <>;} } ", "title": "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/Stylesheet", "tags": "css $:/tags/Stylesheet", "modifier": "HC Haase", "modified": "20200826070945293" }, "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/macro/transclusion": { "text": "\define box-transclusion() <$link> <$transclude field="text" mode="block" /> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion" stateIndex="transclude-created" default="show" text="hide" > <$list filter="[is[current]has[modified]]">modified <$view field="modified" format="relativedate"/> ( <$view field="modified" format="date" template="0DD. MMM YYYY"/>). <$list filter="[is[current]]">created: <$view field="created" format="date" template="0DD. MMM YYYY"/> \end \define toc-list-transclusion(filter:"all[current]backlinks[]") <$list filter="$filter$ -[tag[hide]] -[tag[outlines]] -[is[system]] -[is[current]sort[title]]"> * <$link> <$transclude field="caption"> <$view field="title"/> <> \end \define toc-list-transclusion-individual(filter:"all[current]backlinks[]") <$list filter="$filter$ -[tag[hide]] -[tag[outlines]] -[is[system]] -[is[current]sort[title]]"> * <$link> <$transclude field="caption"> <$view field="title"/> <$reveal class="hideprint" type="nomatch" stateTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" stateIndex=<> default={{$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate!!default-state-transclude}} text="show" > <$button setTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" setIndex=<> setTo="show" class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Show content" > {{$:/core/images/unfold-button}} <$reveal class="hideprint" type="match" stateTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" stateIndex=<> default={{$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate!!default-state-transclude}} text="show" > <$button setTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" setIndex=<> setTo="hide" class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Hide content" > {{$:/core/images/fold-button}} <$reveal class="hideprint" type="match" stateTitle="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion-individual" stateIndex=<> default={{$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate!!default-state-transclude}} text="show" > <> \end * ''Version'': 2.0.0 * ''Date'': 2020/05/05 * ''Creator'': HC Haase. Mostly a copy of elements from Davids [[TiddlyBlink edition|https://giffmex.org/gifts/tiddlyblink.html]]. !! Function transcluds tiddlers for the list in a (indented) box with the colour of "code background" and date stamp in the right corner (toggle in settings). !! Use ;Syntax for lists with transclusion :`<>` <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param="<>"}>Copy filter already includes generic filtering. only include filter for the specefic list. * for links filter `all[current]backlinks[]` * for list `list{!!title}` * for listed `all[current]listed[]` ;Syntax for lists with transclusion-individual :`<>` <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param="<>"}>Copy filter already includes generic filtering. only include filter for the specific list. * for links filter `all[current]backlinks[]` * for list `list{!!title}` * for listed `all[current]listed[]` ;Syntax for box with transcluson only (no initial link) :`<>` <$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param="<>"}>Copy !! Other macros in this plugin in [[$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/core/macros/toc-tranclusion]] The following macros are added, to produce transcluding toc's (it contains the above `<>` macro). * `<>` * `<>` * `<>` ", "title": "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/macro/transclusion", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modifier": "HC Haase", "modified": "20210215102023747", "creator": "HC Haase", "created": "20200326095623095" }, "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/changelog": { "created": "20200203125209497", "creator": "HC Haase", "text": "I'm trying to follow the rules of [[Semantic Versioning|https://semver.org/]]. v. 2.2.1 * [Fix] the references list disappeared instead of collapse when pressed * [new] added freelinks partial match mode. toggle in settings * [new] added submenu under "references". toggle with {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} to the right v. 2.2.0 * [New] added freelinks (copied form [[TWCrossLinks|https://akhater.github.io/drift/#%24%3A%2Fak%2Fplugins%2FTWCrossLinks]]) for full match (partial match coming soon) * [New] added options to remove any of the lists (in settings) v. 2.1.1 * [Fix] bug in the style sheet (}) interfered with other plugins (thanks Mat). v. 2.1.0 * [New] added transclusion of individual tiddlers, to the ''toc, backlinks, list'' and ''listed'' (also recursive through the toc)(from tiddly blink) * [New] enable use of the caption field (if present) in transclusion mode, for link/list/listed * [Change] Improved documentation * [New] moved settings from ./readme to ./settings tiddler v. 2.0.1 * [Fix] close transclusion button at the bottom right showed for both links and tags, even if only one of these lists where present v. 2.0.0 * [New] added transclusion of tiddlers, to the ''toc, backlinks, list'' and ''listed'' (also recursive through the toc)(from tiddly blink) * [New] added toggle transclusion button at the "references" top and at the end of transcluded ''toc, backlinks, list'' and ''listed''. Also available in the readme * [New] added modified/created date in the bottom right corner of transcluded tiddlers in the lists (toggle in readme) * [New] made the transclusion background (grey box) and text, follow the theme (code class). This means you can use dark themes and still read the text. * [Change] changed settings from radio buttons to checkbox in the readme 2020/02/18 - v. 1.2.10 * [FIX] if references is closed, hide it in when printing 2020/02/06 - v. 1.2.9 * [New] changing list visibility show/hide will not trigger "red save wiki button". The visibility state is now stored in state (json) tiddlers that do not make the wiki dirty, but will be saved on wiki save. 2020/02/04 - v. 1.2.8 * [Fix] bug that reversed toggles 2020/02/04 - v. 1.2.7 * [New] Set default show/hide status of all lists. Note the default is overridden when status is changed in individual tiddler (by design). * [New] delete individual tiddler show/hide setting and set default instead * [Fix] tiddlers with colon: in title can now toggle the view of lists 2020/01/31 - v. 1.2.5 * [New] new default hide/show icon is set to text and use the arrows used in the normal TOC to keep it consistent with TW (can be changed by user) * [New] big one: all "sub" headings (tags, backlinks, list and listed) can be folded/hidden by clicking on them * [New] the reveal status for the general hide/show and for the sub-lists are tiddler specific and remembered (stored in a data tiddler) * [New] position in viewtemplate is set in the plugin viewtemplate by a list-after field. 2020/01/27 * [Fix] the hide button no longer appear on tiddlers with nothing to show. * [New] option to change icon/text of buttons in the readme.", "title": "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/changelog", "tags": "", "modifier": "HC Haase", "modified": "20210312124433599" }, "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/readme": { "created": "20200124094640539", "creator": "HC Haase", "text": "This plugin is meant to show connections up front, and to act as a better table of content on index tiddlers. It has the core features: * at the bottom of every tiddler'' all references is shown'' in lists. ** tags ** backlinks ** Freelinks ** list (the content of the list field of the present tiddler) ** listed (other tiddlers that have the tiddler in there list field) * ''all lists are collapsible''. All sublists can be closed/opened by clicking on the header for the list. * ''all lists are conditional'', the lists will ONLY appear if there is something in them (e.g. if you don't see the backlink list, it is because there are no backlinks to that tiddler) ** if no tags/links/list/listed are present nothing is shown. The primary toggle (references button) is also hidden *'' show content of all tiddlers'' (transclusions) in the lists (1. button to the right of "references") ** also recursive through the tags table of content ** hide all content with a button at the end of lists (handy for long lists) ** the grey text-box is a link to the tiddler * ''show content of individual tiddlers'' (transclusions) in the lists (activate with 2. button to the right of "references" and toggle at each individual tiddler in the list) * ''show modified/created date'' in bottom right corner of transcluded tiddlers (toggle in settings) in addition it is *mobile friendly ** no hover (better for touchscreens) ** vertical layout with few clicks (better for scrolling) *print friendly ** buttons is hidden on print ** if something is collapsed, or everything is collapsed, the button are also hidden on print *customisable ** name of primary "references" heading/button is changeable in the [[settings|$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/settings]] ** default visibility for lists is changeable in [[settings|$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/settings]] You can customise the look and function in the [[settings|$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/settings]] to fit your needs. !! Why I made this This was inspired by the forum discussion on [[bi-directional linking|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/tiddlywiki/LUVTps01UBU]] to show tiddler connection better. This is an attempt to make all connections more visible for all tiddlers. You can see the same information in the info panel of the tiddlers, but this hopefully make the connections stand out more. !! Acknowledgement Thanks to * David Gifford (transclusion taken from the [[TiddlyBlink edition|https://giffmex.org/gifts/tiddlyblink.html]]) * Mohammad for help with [[filtering|https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/tiddlywiki/tOeRa6973As]] * TonyM for help with [[custom exclusion of tiddlers|https://groups.google.com/d/msg/TiddlyWiki/KZWhS-BtZCQ/WWpDZIREBQAJ]] (coming soon) * Akhator (freelinks filter copied from [[TWCrossLinks|https://akhater.github.io/drift/#%24%3A%2Fak%2Fplugins%2FTWCrossLinks]]) I and David developed our plugins around the same time, but when I stopped, David continued to develop lots of cool features, so I borrowed a little from him. The code for transcluding tiddler content is adopted form David Gifford's [[TiddlyBlink edition|https://giffmex.org/gifts/tiddlyblink.html]]. !!!!What's the difference between TiddlyBlink and TOC generic? TiddlyBlink is more focused on linking and have a complete setup for building a link centred wiki. The TOC generic plugin can use ''tags ''as well as links and are more focused on showing information and connections, not editing. TOC generic is a plugin and can be used in any wiki with a pre-existing organisation. !! Road map At some point I want to *~~ incorporate transclusions from Daves BiLink plugin~~ *~~toggle transclusion for individual list items~~ * make a alternative sort button * colour code boxes according to tags (or other stuff??)( make a tag picker secondary/tetriary sorter/indexer) * Add an exclude-filter (e.g. exclude advanced search) * (maybe) make toc by custom (input) filter (like Pmario's tocp) / use any field sorting to make a toc * (maybe) Add set start of toc like Tonys example (https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/TiddlyWiki/wijV7wNnwpQ)", "title": "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/readme", "modifier": "HC Haase", "modified": "20210312125108135" }, "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/settings": { "created": "20200519065529571", "creator": "HC Haase", "text": "!! Customisations !!! Buttons You can change the reveal /hide buttons (or text) here. the default is `{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}__References__` and `{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}__References__`. If you like icons you could transclude e.g. a chevron like thiks `{{$:/core/images/chevron-up}}`, to get arrows {{$:/core/images/chevron-up}} . Reveal button: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="button_reveal" default="{{$:/core/images/chevron-down}}"/> >{{$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate!!button_reveal}} Hide Button: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="button_hide" default="{{$:/core/images/chevron-up}}"/> >{{$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate!!button_hide}} !!! Default visibility You can change the visibility of the lists and other elements, or change if they are folded or unfolded by default. |!|!Enable|!Unfold| |Top level list | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-visible" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show" > | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show" > | |Tag list | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-visible-tag" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show" > | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-tag" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show" > | |Backlinks list | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-visible-backlinks" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show" > | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-backlinks" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show" > | |Freelinks list ( <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="freelink-search-pat" checked="fullMatch" unchecked="PartialMatch" default="fullMatch" > full or <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="freelink-search-pat" checked="PartialMatch" unchecked="fullMatch" default="fullMatch" > partial match) | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-visible-freelinks" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show" > | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-freelinks" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show" > | |Lists list | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-visible-list" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide" > | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-list" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide" > | |Listed list | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-visible-listed" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide" > | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate" field="default-state-listed" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="hide" > | <$checkbox tiddler="$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-transclusion" index="transclude-created" checked="show" unchecked="hide" default="show" > Show modified/created date in the right corner of the content box When you hide/show the list on a tiddler,'' the chosen state for that individual tiddler is remembered and overrides this default!'' Below you can delete the state and revert to default. <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$:/state/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state]]"/> Reset lists visibility to the above defaults for all individual tiddlers (''can not be undone!!'') (you can do this manually by deleting $:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/state-xx tiddlers). ", "title": "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/settings", "tags": "", "modifier": "HC Haase", "modified": "20210312111321110" }, "$:/plugins/HCHaase/TOCgeneric/ViewTemplate": { "created":
